text: Jeferson Santos Junior (born 19 April 1999) is a Brazilian judoka. He won a medal at the 2019 World Judo Championships. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male judoka Category:Judoka at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games medalists in judo Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Brazil
title: Jeferson Santos Junior
